Text: RE Fw Your Sons First NFL GameSorry manwasnt sure what your deal wasIll make sure to send any questionable material to the other address How about those Stamps Grey Cup bound baby JonathanMckay enroncom To Glen BMCA cc Subject RE Fw Your Sons First NFL Game PM You cant send this to my work send it to Thanks Jon Very funny though Original Message From Glen MillerCanWestContrIBM ENRON Sent Monday November AM To Mckay Jonathan Subject FW Fw Your Sons First NFL Game what a game Tickets to the game First beer with your dad Seeing your first set close uppriceless See attached file pricelessjpg pricelessjpg File pricelessjpg This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Fw Your Sons First NFL GameI understand completelyno wayStamps finished nd played BC at McMahon in the semi finalbeat them went to Edmonton for the final yesterday and killed them Now its off to Montreal against Winnipeg More later
DogfightPST See attached file Dogfightjpg Dogfightjpg

REPST You obviously forget the deafening tones of McMahon Stadium Now thats loud baby Getting colder by the day up heredown into the low teens the last few days even had a bit of snow on the weekend Played hockey last night and although it was my first time on skates in months I held up okay We won Too bad about Notre DameI guess theyre not the usual Irish powerhouse this year Catch that Monday Nighter yesterday SkinsCowboysdidnt think sowhat a yawner Absolutely deplorable football Glad you didnt get me a Bagwell jersey those bums couldnt do anything against Brave pitching I just hope the Mariners come out of it all Im going homemore tomorrow We miss you tooScottys not too big on going to watch football
PST Hey buddy whats going on Just wondering what youre up tothings settled down a little for you Im going to hockey tonight for the first time this yearI can already feel the groin pull

wowPST Hey Jonny whats up Jeez just heard about the bombings how is that affecting you guys Let me know whats going on Scotty told me about your house being soldthats great I think Im going over with him tonight to start clearing out some stuffIll grab the plants and the light like we discussedScott may store the poker table for me Let me know if theres anything else you need us to do Hope everythings okay down there

PST Jonny hows it going Just wondering how the living arrangements are so far Im sure its all still very blissful being as its only been days Hopefully you guys are doing okay Wasnt sure if your email address changed or notget back to me when you have a minute let me know whats happening Glen

Hot Tubvery HOTPST Guess what time it is everyone Its Embedded image moved to file picpcxEmbedded image moved to file picpcx The Date Friday July The Place A St SW Take Elbow Dr South Turn right on th Ave Then turn right at A St just after the school Any problems call me at or on my cell Bring Booze swim trunks music if you like Basically whatever you wantI have some stuff Time If Friday is anything like what the rest of July has been like I figure an early afternoon may be in order right Bob so anytime after that is fine with me Rub a dub in the tub Glen picpcx picpcx
